completed.title: Set Up Redux Store and React Query
completed.summary: Created Redux store with 4 slices (auth, donor, project, crm), set up React Query with 23 custom hooks, integrated providers in app layout, added comprehensive documentation

completed.title: Build Core Dashboard UI Components
completed.summary: Created DashboardLayout with Sidebar and Header, built 5 reusable UI components (Button, Card, Input, Select, Modal), created dashboard home page with stats and activity feed, implemented responsive design with Tailwind CSS, full accessibility support

completed.title: Implement Donor Search and Intelligence UI
completed.summary: Created DonorSearch, IntelligenceBrief, and DonorList components with table/grid views, added 4 supporting UI components (Badge, Skeleton, Alert, Progress), implemented search history with localStorage, built donor pages with full intelligence display, comprehensive loading and error states

completed.title: Implement AI Service Integration Layer
completed.summary: Created Gemini and OpenAI service classes with automatic fallback, designed 4 prompt templates (donor intelligence, relationship analysis, engagement strategy, project alignment), implemented exponential backoff retry logic, built response parser with validation, added 7 custom error classes, comprehensive logging and monitoring (3,633 lines of production-ready code)

completed.title: Generate TypeScript Database Types
completed.summary: Generated TypeScript types from Supabase schema (511 lines), verified all 8 tables present (organizations, profiles, donors, relationships, projects, donor_project_alignments, crm_integrations, activity_log), confirmed Supabase client imports working correctly

completed.title: Implement Authentication System
completed.summary: Built complete authentication system with email/password and OAuth support, created AuthProvider with Supabase integration, implemented login/signup/forgot-password pages, added protected route middleware, created database trigger for auto profile creation, integrated with Redux auth state, comprehensive documentation (AUTH_IMPLEMENTATION.md, OAUTH_SETUP.md)

completed.title: Create Donor Intelligence Edge Function
completed.summary: Created production-ready Supabase Edge Function (311 lines) with input validation, JWT auth, organization isolation, AI integration via orchestrator (Gemini/OpenAI fallback), database operations for donor creation/updates, comprehensive error handling, test scripts (bash & PowerShell), complete documentation (API docs, deployment checklist, setup guide)
